At the time of writing he's developing PHP solutions for the company he's working for and learning Ruby and RoR.
 
He's using a Xen 3.0 powered virtual machine to host all his stuff. The machine - called r0xx0r - is running Debian Sid. He's using Debian as his primary server OS and Ubuntu for all the desktops.

He started unix linux for a packet radio - internet gateway, during the 1990s. This was the first AMPRNET gateway to bring up in Italy. Running JNOS-Box with modifications from him (MD5 passwords and OSPF routing optimizations). 

He worked for a online gaming company as a senior system manager. During this period he was a volunteer for some online communities as <nowiki>[[http://www.efnet.org/|EFnet]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.quakenet.org/|QuakeNET]]</nowiki> as an IRCop and helped the development of the Paladin Anticheat for Counter Strike.
